Posts.Content: squeakypeaches wrote: I am currently undergoing treatment with weekly Taxol and Herceptin.  This morning I got a nosebleed after blowing my nose.  I have gotten the bleeding stopped, but I was wondering if I need to contact my doctor today.  Is this an emergency? Anyone know...is it the Taxol that is causing the bleeding?  I guess it sounds like my platelets are down. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nose Bleed - Is This an Emergency? squeakypeaches debbiehag
